text:
Hey guys, it’s Ro! I wanted to make a quick
video about my official social media pages.

I got a lot of questions from you guys about
which pages are me!?
So I thought I would talk about it today!

The first order of business in social media
news! Is, I just got a Snapchat!

I’ve had it for a few weeks, I’m totally
obsessed with it! It is so much fun!

So, if you' like to see some behind the scenes
clips, my friends, my family,

a lot of snaps of my dog Cookie! And, a lot
of food!

It’s really easy, you just open the app,
type my name into search, you’ll type

Rosanna Pansino, no spaces, the full name,
and boom, there I am!
I’ll be making a lot of these faces…

And I have red lipstick on, that’s my little
avatar.
That’s how you know it’s me!

My other social media pages on Twitter, Facebook
and Instagram are all

Rosanna Pansino, my full name, with no spaces,
I’ll put ‘em over here so

you guys can see. I also, have a Pinterest,
but in all honesty I haven’t used it
that much yet, it needs some love!

And again, my name on Pinterest is Rosanna
Pansino, full name, no spaces!
And ooooh! I have some news! I just opened Nerdy Nummies social media pages on Twitter, Facebook

and Instagram! All of them are Nerdy Nummies,
the full word.

I got a lot of questions from you guys because
I just opened them and a lot of

people were saying, is this the official Nerdy
Nummies page? Because it doesn’t

have the blue checkmark yet. And the answer
is yes!

These are the official Nerdy Nummies pages,
I just haven’t gotten an official

checkmark yet. But don’t worry you guys,
it’s coming!

I’m really excited because these accounts
are becoming more and more active,

I’m gonna be posting behind the scenes videos,
pictures, awesome fan art that

you guys make and a bunch of baking creations
that you guys make!

I want to create spaces where people can come
together from the Nerdy Nummies

community and just share with each other and
get to know each other.
I thought that’d be pretty cool!

Lastly, before I end the video, I wanted to
give a big thank you to all the

Fansinos out there, you guys show me so much
love and support, I absolutely love

all of the fan accounts that are out there,
you guys make the best edits!
It just makes me so excited, it makes my day.

Hope you guys found the clarification helpful,
love you guys, bye-bye!
